message.content: {"id": "11863", "title": "Bug 11863: Update Test Suite action does not allow removal", "description": "", "OB": "When attempting to use the 'Update' action for Test Suite, there is no option to remove the existing content (dir, zip) and modify it. As a result, the update functionality is currently limited.", "EB": "To address this issue, I suggest renaming the action and the corresponding dialog to 'Recreate Test Suite'. This new name would better reflect the functionality and allow users to effectively modify the existing content.", "SR": "Update the 'Update' action and associated dialog to be named 'Recreate Test Suite'. This will enable users to modify and remove the existing content when necessary."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '11863', 'title': 'Bug 11863Update Test Suite action does not allow to remove', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'Normally "Update"shows the content of the existing stuff (dir, zip) and allows to modify this.I think renaming the action (and the dialog) to Recreate Test Suite would solvethe problem.
